name: NETXP EQL Loading images from remote shares
description: security feature prevents and logs the loading of images from remote UNC/WebDAV shares. This is a crucial defense against a common exploitation technique known as DLL hijacking, often employed to load attacker code from a controlled location. This technique is exemplified by the MS10-046 shortcut icon DLL loader exploit. By blocking the loading of images from external, potentially malicious sources, this security measure helps safeguard against vulnerabilities and malicious code execution.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
any where event.code == "7" or event.code == "9" and winlog.channel: "Microsoft-Windows-Security-Mitigations"  
// oczekuje dodanego kanalu Mitigations
